text: Just the fact that `Project.toml` and `Manifest.toml` are generated by default and not something you have to actively manage are so huge

elements.text: are generated by default and not something you have to actively manage are so huge

text: reproducibility by default is a whole different ballgame from potential reproducibility that people might or might not opt into
